thread.section_title: Hotel Napoleon Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Staff made it even more special
thread.title_full: Staff made it even more special - Review of Hotel Napoleon Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: PortiaTurbo
title: Staff made it even more special
text:
The Napoleon is comfortable, clean and 60 meters from the Arc de Triomphe. Rooms are compact but beautiful, beds gave us a great nights sleep and the water pressure in the shower is excellent. Breakfast was also good. It's a 5 star so you expect all that.
Our major reason for loving Napoleon so much is that 90% of the staff we dealt with were extraordinary, they really took the time to make sure our stay exceeded expectations on so many levels.
